note.p: Death: Highfield Park, Heckfield, near Reading (09 November 1940)
Burial: His ashes were interred in Westminster Abbey
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 731-734 by W W Hadley
References: William McGucken, 'The Royal Society and the Genesis of the Scientific Advisory Committee to Britain's War Cabinet, 1939-1940' in NR 1978-9 vol 33 pp 87-115
